publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2777 Trish Godman: Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics—That the Parliament warmly congratulates the members of the Great Britain Olympic women’s curling team and Alain Baxter for their outstanding achievements at the Winter Olympic Games; acknowledges their dedication and hard work in preparing for the Games and commends all of those clubs and individuals who have given such unstinting support to these Scottish gold and bronze medallists and other Scottish competitors at the Olympics.

S1M-2777 Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics (lodged on 25 February 2002) Mr John McAllion*, Johann Lamont*, Janis Hughes*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Bristow Muldoon*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Rhoda Grant*, Elaine Thomson*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-2777 Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics (lodged on 25 February 2002) Elaine Smith*, Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, Bruce Crawford*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-2777 Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics (lodged on 25 February 2002) Dennis Canavan*, Susan Deacon*, Cathie Craigie*

S1M-2777 Trish Godman: Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics-That the Parliament warmly congratulates the members of the Great Britain Olympic women's curling team and Alain Baxter for their outstanding achievements at the Winter Olympic Games; acknowledges their dedication and hard work in preparing for the Games and commends all of those clubs and individuals who have given such unstinting support to these Scottish gold and bronze medallists and other Scottish competitors at the Olympics. Supported by: Mr John McAllion, Johann Lamont, Janis Hughes, Mr John Home Robertson, Bristow Muldoon, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Rhoda Grant, Elaine Thomson, Brian Fitzpatrick, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Elaine Smith, Des McNulty, Jackie Baillie, Bruce Crawford, Karen Whitefield, Dennis Canavan, Susan Deacon, Cathie Craigie
S1M-2777 Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics (lodged on 25 February 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2777 Scottish Medallists at the Winter Olympics (lodged on 25 February 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
